Title: Requires contractors and subcontractors performing construction work for covered renewable energy systems to use apprenticeship agreements
Summary: Requires contractors and subcontractors performing construction work for covered renewable energy systems to use apprenticeship agreements with pre-apprenticeship direct entry providers registered with the department of labor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring contractors and subcontractors performing construction work for covered renewable energy systems to use apprenticeship agreements
